DESCRIPTION: GLib is a general-purpose utility library, which provides many useful data types, macros, type conversions, string utilities, file utilities, a main loop abstraction, and so on.
DEPENDS:
glib-2.0-native            virtual/libintl            virtual/libiconv            libffi            zlib
!!!inlineblock!!!
 gettext-native
inherit:
meson gettext gtk-doc pkgconfig ptest-gnome upstream-version-is-even bash-completion gio-module-cache manpages
siteinfo
RDEPENDS_${PN}-ptest:
${PN}-utils
